divs: Sighting DetailsWe were staying the night at at our grandmothers home, we playing outside when we looked up and saw a bright redish yellow light. It was going fast at about 800mph, soon after we saw two jets heading straight for it speeding quick. but the U.F.O was to fast for them. We watched it until it was out of sight.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Anderson
There were no other sightings in Anderson on or around April 20th 2010
Summary: Bright light with jets following it.
